body:
Reported twice on the forum.
The issue is not reliably reproducible but sometimes the game asks for white mana to be payed instead of green. When it does, the mana symbol on the card shows as {W}.

A worrying bug IMO because the mana cost is parsed from cards.txt and therefor could affect other cards.
